attributes.action: Give parents the choice to send children school or not
attributes.additional_details:
•To save lives 
•Help people’s mental health 
•This allows people who need to work still be able to with a very high chance of there being less children in schools so less chance of the virus spreading the schools are trying but it’s not safe enough right now my children are mixing with with over 400 people between the 3 of them I am not comfortable with this
attributes.background: Stop punishing parents for wanting to keep there children off school in these worrying times education can be caught up but people can’t be bought back from the dead it’s a massive risk
